== Seraulim (626899) ==

Seraulim is a village in the [[Salcete]] taluka of [[South Goa]] district with an area of 271 hectares and harbouring 777 households with total population of 3250 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[MARGAO]] is at a distance of 5 km. Male population is 1589 and female population is 1661. Scheduled Caste Population is 143 and Scheduled Tribes population is 8. Census Location Code of the village is 626899<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
